Html:
Hello,

redirectUrl=https://typescript.codeplex.com/discussions/create?wikiPageTitle=https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues&referer=http://www.typescriptlang.org/Handbook&ProjectName=typescript&associate=None

There is a typo on this page:
http://www.typescriptlang.org/Handbook

In the sentence:

"Just as in JavaScript, functions can return to variables outside of the function body."

The word "return" should be "refer".

Thank you.
